name: I Love the Light so Moth
name_original: I Love the Light so Moth
description:
I Love the Light so Moth is a game about moths that worship their holy light. They are so busy worshipping, that they don't even realise what's going on. Maybe you can find the truth?

Created for ZenoJam 5
The Theme was: Light Attracts Bugs

How to play:
Use WASD to move around, and mouse for shooting

We are two Data Science students who worked on this project during the jam.
We have participated in one Jam together before, but neither of us have any other experience with Arts and Music.

Everything was made for the Jam only.

Thanks for playing!

Nikkilite - Developer, Art & Music
Froggystyle - Developer, Artist & Animator
